patthana19.15:1.1: Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana19.15:2.1: Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.15:4.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:5.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:6.1: Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.15:7.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
